mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HISTORIES WHERE USER_ID = #{string}

SELECT H.FEED_ID AS feed_id ,TO_CHAR(H.HISTORY_INDATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS history_indate ,FD.PAGE_FILE AS preview FROM HISTORIES H, FEED_DRAWINGS FD WHERE H.USER_ID = #{string} AND FD.FEED_ID = H.FEED_ID AND FUNC_SPLIT(FD.PAGE_FILE, '--divide--', 1) = '1.png' ORDER BY H.HISTORY_INDATE DESC
